resources.string: Mods related to home screen of WhatsApp.
Mods related to individual chat screen of WhatsApp.
Liking the mod? Consider rewarding me for this hard work.
Use this link to donate me through Paypal.
Scan this QR code to donate me through Paytm.
Would you like to support me by having a new UI with ads? Then enable this.
Click to check if a new update is released.
Check out what\'s new in this version.
Click to view what the developer has to say(NOTE:Active internet connection required).
Find out the people who helped me in this project.
Liking it? Then dont wait to share and spread it among your family and friends.
Something wrong? Contact me by typing in your comments in the dialog box that appears after clicking. PLEASE Mail this report else I cannot respond.
Options that modify colors in all screens in general.
Options that modify colors in home screen.
Options that modify colors in chat screen.
Options that modify floating action button in home chats screen.
Your Last Seen will be paused from the moment this is enabled.(Note:You can\'t see other\'s Last Seen if this is enabled).
Messages will not be deleted from your side when sender deletes it.
Stay online even while not online(Make sure whatsapp is not killed from recents).
Don\'t Tell contact that you viewed their status.
Enable to copy Text status to clipboard and to freeze time.
If enabled then your contacts can\'t know if you\'ve read the message or not.
If enabled then your contact will not know if you\'ve listened to the audio or not.
Enable if you don\'t want anyone to know that you\'re recording an audio.
Enable if you don\'t want anyone to know that you\'re typing a message.
If enabled then your group participants can\'t know if you\'ve read the message or not.
If enabled then your group participants can\'t know if you\'ve listened to the audio or not.
If enabled then your broadcast list can\'t know if you\'ve read the message or not.
If enabled then your broadcast list can\'t know if you\'ve listened to the audio or not.
Reset Your All Privacy Settings including Custom Privacy To Default.
Removes the CALLS STATUS and CHATS tab from home screen.
t2.2 Last seen in Main Screen
Shows Contact\'s Last Seen in Main Screen.
Replace \"WhatsApp\" with your profile name in Actionbar.
Enable if you want to set either your number or status under name in Actionbar.
t2.5 Choose between Number or Status
"Provides a toast whenever a contact comes online. Note: 1. You must be online 2. You must have a chat created with contact"
Hide Contact\'s message in Chats screen.
Hide date, time and name while copying two or more messages.
Enable text selection to copy part of a message.
Move voice and video call button to 3 dot menu.
Switch between Tenor and Giphy provider. Enable-Tenor, Disable-Giphy.
Display contact\'s status below actionbar in chat screen.
Move name and last seen to center of actionbar.
Clear huge Log files created by app.
Switch to Pattern type lock instead of PIN lock.
Download themes created by other users.
Restore a theme you\'ve downloaded or shared.
Clear all and reset to default.
Enabled by default, disable to turn it off.
Choose a color for texts or icons in Actionbar.
Choose a color for Status bar.
Choose a color for Navigation Bar.
Choose a color for Chats,Status and Calls tab.
Choose a color for background of Unread counter.
Choose a color for \"Online\" text if Last Seen in Main Screen is enabled.
Choose a color for \"Last Seen at\" if Last Seen in Main Screen is enabled.
Choose a color for background of chats in homescreen.
Choose a color for CALLS, STATUS and CHATS texts.
Choose a color for Contact\'s name in Chats tab.
Choose a color for Date in Chats tab.
Choose a color for the recent sender\'s name in a group.
Choose a color for incoming message in chat tab.
Choose a color for the message count in chats tab.
v3.13 Contact Name in Status Tab color
Choose a color for Contact\'s name in Status tab.
Choose a color for the time when status is uploaded.
v3.15 Contact\'s name in Calls tab color
Choose a color for Contact\'s name in calls tab.
Choose a color for calls count in calls tab.
Choose a color for time of call in calls tab.
Change Text size for entire main screen.
Choose a color for Contact Name in Actionbar.
Choose a color for Contact Last Seen.
Choose a color for Status Background if Status under name is enabled.
Choose a Color for Status Text if Status under name is enabled.
Choose a color for the background of messages that you send.
Choose a color for time of messages that you send.
Choose a color for messages that you send.
Choose a color for the background of messages that you receive.
Choose a color for the time of messages that you receive.
Choose a color for the messages that you receive.
Choose a color for the messages that you type.
Choose a color for the text that is present before typing.
Choose a color for the background of text that you type.
Choose a color for the send/voice note button.
Choose a color for the Send/Voice button background.
Choose a color for contact name when a message is quoted.
Choose a color for messages that are quoted.
Choose a color for the background of a quoted message.
Enable to hide current FAB button and replace with stock FAB button.
Choose a color for FAB when pressed.
Choose a color to set as background when FAB is clicked.
Status is now copied to clipboard
